specifications.definition: Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
Screens come in a range of resolutions (measured in pixels, horizontal x vertical). The higher the resolution, the greater the picture quality.
Touch-screen devices make navigating more intuitive. Using a touch-screen display, you can do things such as tap to select, hold and drag to move items, swipe to scroll, and pinch to zoom.

Your computer's processor is like its brain. Working in combination with system memory, the power of the processor determines the complexity of software you can run, how many programs you can have open at the same time, and how fast those programs will run. Most computers feature an Intel or AMD processor.

Random-access memory (RAM) is a computing device's short-term data storage, which allows active information to be accessed quickly. The size and type of RAM determines how efficiently the device can handle large amounts of information at one time. For example, gaming or video editing requires more RAM for optimal performance.
Often referred to as a "graphics processing unit" (GPU), this device is responsible for displaying image content and decoding/encoding video content in programs and games.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.
Integrated lights allow for visibility of the keys in low-light conditions.

specifications.value: MacBook Pro 13.3" Laptop - Apple M2 chip - 8GB Memory - 256GB SSD (Latest Model)

specifications.definition: Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
Screens come in a range of resolutions (measured in pixels, horizontal x vertical). The higher the resolution, the greater the picture quality.
Touch-screen devices make navigating more intuitive. Using a touch-screen display, you can do things such as tap to select, hold and drag to move items, swipe to scroll, and pinch to zoom.

Your computer's processor is like its brain. Working in combination with system memory, the power of the processor determines the complexity of software you can run, how many programs you can have open at the same time, and how fast those programs will run. Most computers feature an Intel or AMD processor.
A core, or "brain" of a CPU, allows it to receive and execute instructions. Each core can work independently or together to perform parallel operations.
The amount of data that can be stored on the device's solid state drive (SSD). SSD is a flash-based storage with faster speeds than a hard disk drive (HDD).

Random-access memory (RAM) is a computing device's short-term data storage, which allows active information to be accessed quickly. The size and type of RAM determines how efficiently the device can handle large amounts of information at one time. For example, gaming or video editing requires more RAM for optimal performance.
Each type of RAM delivers a different level of speed, bandwidth, energy efficiency and performance.

Dedicated graphics uses a separate graphics card for processing video images. Because it does not use memory from the system's RAM, there is no extra burden on the CPU and graphics are processed more efficiently. Integrated graphics shares system RAM to process video images.
Often referred to as a "graphics processing unit" (GPU), this device is responsible for displaying image content and decoding/encoding video content in programs and games.

The operating system manages all software and hardware, including files, memory and connected devices. Most importantly, it lets you interact with your device and your programs in a visual way; otherwise, you'd be typing computer code to get anything done.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.
The number and type of USB ports the product has.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.
Integrated lights allow for visibility of the keys in low-light conditions.
The out of box weight of the item.

Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria. Products are rated Bronze, Silver or Gold based on how many of 28 optional criteria they meet (below 50%, 50%, 75%).

faqs.questionTitle: Hello, is there a difference between the m1 chip that stand out majorly, I am looking toward purchasing a pro model before this came out. Now it is one sale and I Don't knwo where to buy the M1 on the Deal price or to wait for this one to come on sale?
answersForQuestion: The only difference is the chip everything else is exactly the same as the M1 MacBook Pro. If its worth it, that's your choice. To help you decide these are the differences between M1 and M2: 18% faster CPU than M1 and 35% faster GPU than M1 and a 40% faster Neural Engine than M1.

According to Apple the M2 offers: “an 18 percent faster CPU, a 35 percent more powerful GPU, and a 40 percent faster Neural Engine.” There is also 50 percent more memory bandwidth compared to M1, and up to 24GB of fast unified memory, which will please many who felt limited by the 16GB cut off offered by the M1. I personally would get the M2 deal if you want better and faster performance rates.

faqs.questionTitle: Hey, When will I be able to purchase or preorder this model of the Macbook, and what are the difference between the two types, I was interested in the MacBook Pro before this came out so I wanted to know if I should wait or get the one that is for salenow
answersForQuestion: You should be able to order it right now. I would wait if I were you, for the MacBook Air Model thats coming out later in July, it has better screen, magsafe, incredibly thin, and it has better speakers. The only thing that the M2 MacBook Pro has going for it is the Touch Bar and it has a fan, plus the M2 MacBook Pro is 100 dollars more expensive than the M2 MacBook Air. If you really need the performance though I would shoot for the 14 inch MacBook pro with the M1 Pro.

faqs.questionTitle: Does this model have the Touch Bar
answersForQuestion: Yes

faqs.questionTitle: If i was looking for a laptop that I will use for trading stocks i.e it will be running live softwares at the back so using a decent amount of processing power. Would you recommend macbook pro m2 or air m2?
answersForQuestion: Macbook Pro M2
ThinkorSwim does not run on apple silicon, if that is what you are asking.

faqs.questionTitle: does this laptop have a cd player? dont see anything mentioned. Thanks
answersForQuestion: No, only 2 usb-c ports.
No, I don’t know of any new computers with CD PLAYERS anymore.
It’s got a 6 disc changer in the trunk.
No

faqs.questionTitle: Does the MAcBook Pro 13.3" have a HDMI port?
answersForQuestion: No it doesn’t have need to buy an external connector

No, but you can purchase one from a 3rd party on Amazon! There are many different types available that also have a variety of ports integrated into an all-in-one unit, like USB-C, USB, TF, HDMI, and SD.

faqs.questionTitle: can a macbook pro or air be suitable for a biology major student?
answersForQuestion: yes -a biochemistry major
Sure, why not

faqs.questionTitle: Can the M2 be upgraded to the newest version. Does the system allow for it?
answersForQuestion: For Macbook. I think you can upgrade operating system as long as Apple still support it. I would say at least 5-7 years down the road.
Yes

faqs.questionTitle: Old and not tech savvy. My main concern is ram. Will the m2 and better cpu help since my current m1 13 air is always near its limit. I know you can but the upgrade but not wanting to at this time. Mostly wanting more screen and better memory.
answersForQuestion:
The M2 certainly provides enhanced processing speed especially when paired with 16GB RAM. I would say it depends on what you are using the MacBook for. If you intend to use it for every day tasks such as Microsoft Office applications, internet browsing, streaming, etc. then the 8GB RAM should be sufficient enough. 

If you intend to do a little more such as video editing, photo editing, or any substantial rendering then I would recommend the M2 with 16GB RAM. Any professional video editing software, photo editing software, or other advanced software, I would look into the M2 Pro editions.

Hope this helps!
Sure. This new Mac has an M2 chip which has lots of power to help you. You can choose between 8GB to 16GB.

faqs.questionTitle: why Only 8GB of RAM the system has configurations up to 24GB? Storage up to 512?
answersForQuestion: When it comes to higher configurations, you must buy directly from Apple.  This is not just at Best Buy but most other licensed Apple retailers.
Just because this one is only 8GB doesn't mean they all are. You can order whatever configuration you want.

faqs.questionTitle: Does this have a numeric keypad?
answersForQuestion: They should bring back the numeric keypads !!
No, this MacBook does not have a numeric keypad.

faqs.questionTitle: Does it come with 30W charger or 70W?
answersForQuestion: 35W dual usb-c block.
The only option is the 30 watt, you can only get the 70 watt through Apple

Mine came with a 35W charger, but that may change if you buy a more powerful version. I know on Apple's website they give you a choice as to which one you want. I would rather have the 70W since I could use my Apple extension cord with the 35W.

faqs.questionTitle: Will this be the best upgrade apple made of laptops???
answersForQuestion: The answer to your question can be very subjective.  For example, if you are upgrading from a previous MacBook Air with an intel chip, this new model will be a MASSIVE upgrade. This new model should last for several years, regardless of what you may use it for.  (Causal, work, content creation, etc).
I think so it’s fast light durable future proof well worth it

faqs.questionTitle: Trade in deals?
answersForQuestion: If you check under the “payment options” of any of the new MacBook Air pages, you should see a box that says “ Save when you trade-in a similar device.”.  Click that to see what value you may receive towards a new MacBook Air.
Yes

faqs.questionTitle: Does this have a speaker
answersForQuestion: Yes. Not a great one though

Hello! 

Yes it has internal speakers, which at first, there seems to be non (as most times they are easy to note with small holes up and down or vertically across (this is in reference to most PC laptop models ive seen). 

But don't fret, it has speakers and a headphone jack 3.5mm on the side (right hand top). 

I hope this helped you in clarifying your question as well as clearly answering it. 

Kindly, 
Will
Yes, it’s in between the crease of the laptop

faqs.questionTitle: Can I use a flash drive with this computer?
answersForQuestion: Of course, but you'll probably need an adapter or hub since this only has USB C ports.

Yes, you will need the adaptor 

Apple - USB-C-to-USB Adapter - White
SKU:6622138
Yes you can

The size and type of RAM determines how efficiently the device can handle large amounts of information at one time. For example, gaming or video editing requires more RAM for optimal performance.
Each type of RAM delivers a different level of speed, bandwidth, energy efficiency and performance.

Dedicated graphics uses a separate graphics card for processing video images. Because it does not use memory from the system's RAM, there is no extra burden on the CPU and graphics are processed more efficiently. Integrated graphics shares system RAM to process video images.

A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.
The number and type of USB ports the product has.
The device features an interface that allows for the connection of headphones.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.

The wireless networking protocol used by the device. Each iteration of the protocol is based on the 802.11 standard developed by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) Standards Association. Denoted by letters following 802.11 (802.11a, 802.11ac, etc.), each version, published in alphabetical order, encompasses all previous versions.

The wireless networking standard used by the device. Each iteration of the standard developed by the Wi-Fi Alliance corresponds to an existing IEEE 802.11 protocol; for example, standard 802.11ac (or AC) is termed Wi-Fi 5. Refers specifically to the standard the device is designed to use, but ultimately determines product interoperability and backward compatibility including previous versions.

Battery life will vary depending on the product configuration, product model, applications loaded on the product, power management setting of the product and the product features used by the customer. As with all batteries, the maximum capacity of this battery will decrease with time and usage.

faqs.questionTitle: Is the delivery time/store pick up date accurate? Or are they delaying orders?
answersForQuestion: Delivery times are never accurate. Bestbuy has changed my delivery date 5 times already. Honestly will never order from bestbuy again.

Their delivery time is NEVER what they say it is. Can expect poor communication, lack of tracking updates, and late deliveries when you order from BestBuy. Can generally expect at least 2-4 days later than what they say it’ll be. Maybe it’s because I’ve been spoiled by Amazon fast and consistent deliveries but, regardless, I don’t plan on ordering from BestBuy again.
Best Buy is horrible with shipping. Will never ever be shopping here again.
Nobody knows anything when you contact support other than it’s not being delivered on time. I will never order from Best Buy again and will stick to competent companies like Amazon.
TERRIBLE WITH STORE PICKUP!!! Ive been waiting days for my order, absolutely no updates from the company. NEVER AGAIN!

Best Buy blatantly lies about delivery time. They said next-day delivery at time of purchase however it's been two days and the item is still "awaiting pickup from the carrier" and they refuse to give me an ETA. I asked if I could go pick up the item from the store or warehouse instead and they said no. I asked if I could speak with the customer representative's supervisor, and she said they would only give me the same answer anyway. I insisted and she then transferred me to some phone directory that required input of an extension number I was never provided. Clearly, this representative was trying to give me the runaround. Atrocious customer service. Will not buy from this company again.

This company is so garbage in shipping. They will give you a shipping date and then delay it the day of delivery . Provide no shipping label because there lazy reps can’t put a label on a item and drop ship it for two weeks. Horrible experience. I assure you Best Buy will have no option after 2021 . They will make the change to allow shipped items available for pickups when delayed shipping is last minute. There Stock is going to plummet. Remember I said this. You’ll see public articles on this horrible shipping issue they seem to have. Customers waiting and waiting and waiting. Don’t buy from Best Buy. They are horrible on integrity and it’s catching up to them . They must not see all the horrible shipping issues with the customers items stocked at surrounding stores. Google is logging dozens of the same complaints on there platform.

Their store pickup is a joke, they have one or 2 people picking items during holiday season in 2021. The best buy I went to had a line out the door with people waiting for their "one hour pick up" promise. They should remove it and stop pretending they can fulfill these orders. I'd rather order from Amazon next time and have it delivered accurately next day. Not same day and I'm sitting here 3 days after with not even an update email.

No. I was told in store when I purchased a washer and dryer that it would be delivered in 3 weeks, Cancelled by Best Buy. Then rescheduled for 2 weeks later, received 2 emails confirming, received a text confirming, received a phone call confirming and waited all day after moving everything so they could get them in, never showed up and never contacted me to tell me they were not coming, I had to call them to find out what was going on which was a major hassle. Now rescheduled again with same thing, already received one email confirming, we shall see. So, to answer your question, ordered in July with promised delivery in 2 weeks, it's now September and I still have no appliances and they have actually billed my credit card. I am going to call them this time and see if they actually have the items and are going to deliver them before I move all this stuff and sit home all day waiting for a no show.

The answer is NO. They didn't come right and accurate time(7AM to 1PM) as they promised.
The delivery man came almost near 10 PM without any notice (except for 5 minutes before he arrive) 
so I had to wait for all day long and couldn't do anything because of this.

As I sit here and type this, I’m without a television that Best Buy stated would be delivered today. I ordered this item from Best Buy - and not Amazon - specifically because the company stated it would arrive sooner. I chatted online with a representative today - he told me the order would arrive on time. And yet, here we are. 

So this will be the last time I opt against Amazon for Best Buy.

Don't trust them!! They can't get it when they say if they even can. When you call to even find where your order is they must not even be able to know themselves because they always have some totally different story so they must be making stuff up! Order still delayed and don't even know if anything is on its way. But they sure took my $900 as fast as possible! What a joke!!
I needed an item asap.Best Buy says get it next day . So I used them instead of Amazon. Of course my item is delayed. Ruined what I needed to accomplish,ish. Last time I use these jokers.

You know I try not to be negative and give people passes because of the holiday season and staff shortages but I will never order online again for delivery. I ordered a $2,000 PC Tuesday for Friday free delivery, they email me Thursday at noon saying that it couldn’t be shipped to my location (even tho everyone else seems to be able to). I was semi annoyed but things happen so I go to order again and it just so happens that my coupon expires that was $200 off and now they want $100 for next day shipping since I needed it by Friday. So I payed extra for everything and my order was delayed and it’s now Monday and it hasn’t even shipped lol. I’ve never had to try so hard to get someone to take $2k from me.
No, they are not accurate

Delayed order. I wish they would kept us up to date even after it gets delayed. All I was notified that it was in a warehouse and location. My order came 3 days later than the time it was given to me.

Don't believe the "delivery date" on popular products and you can't trust them even when order shows "delivered". Spent 2.5 hours today between BB Chat, UPS Chat, and BB phone support to no avail, had to get a refund. Ordered Oct. 1, showed shipped Oct. 6 for Oct. 7 delivery. Item sat, and sat some more, 5 days later UPS still shows "label created" and doesn't show picked up. BB has 3 stories, one said it shipped but just hasn't updated at UPS, another said it didn't ship because UPS delayed the pickup (5 days, really?), third one never said exactly, just that she could "re-ship" or refund. faqs.questionTitle: What is the difference in a macbook air, vs a macbook pro?
answersForQuestion: The MacBook Pro has slightly better battery life, GPU, speakers, and microphone, and screen brightness.. The MacBook Pro also has the Touch Bar, but the Air just has a regular row of function keys. Another pretty big difference is that the MacBook Air has no fans where as the MacBook Pro does have fans.

Very Similar! The main differences that I can see are that you have more USB ports on the Pro, and you are able to run the pro without the processor throttling down to a slower speed because of thermal issues. Basically, the Pro has a Fan, the Air doesn't. 

I bought the Air with 8gb, however ive decided to return it for a Pro with 16gb. I thought 8 would be enough, but it turns out After Effects needs a lot of ram.

The MacBook Pro also provides 2 hours of extra battery life. The performance (all-around) will be better on the Pro as the Air uses a software-throttling system to control heat, which means if there's a scenario where a fan would be required to cool the machine, the Air will simply throttle the CPU/GPU as a way to deter or alleviate heat.

faqs.questionTitle: What change in these model from the previous model
answersForQuestion: It has a new processor designed by Apple called the M1. It is stated to be faster and more efficient than the Intel's they sell. There are a few little changes, this is just the largest change.

The MacBook Air (Late 2020) has the new Apple M1 chip. It is proven by YouTubers to have superb performance and efficiency compared to Intel and AMD CPUs. If you can, do not buy any Intel MacBook. Get this new M1 MacBook Air, or get the M1 MacBook Pro 13 inch. If you want an even higher end model, just wait as Apple plans to transition its entire Mac lineup to Apple Silicon. Apple’s processors are insanely good, they’ve been doing it for a decade on iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch, so it looks to be paying off on the Mac. All of your apps still work too - as unoptimized apps run under Apple’s special emulation; which often is faster than when it runs natively on Intel. If you don’t know what that means, just know that all of your apps will work on this MacBook with absolutely no major issues. Hope this helps!

The M1 uses Apple's own chip which is faster than the intel i3 or i5. I had purchased an i3 a few days before the M1 dropped (didn't know this version was coming out) and the i3 was heating up doing casual activities (browsing, typing, a few tabs open) and the fan kicked in which was a bit loud. I didn't want to deal with a hot laptop and loud fan noises so I returned my i3 for the M1 and what a difference! The battery life is outstanding as lasts pretty much all day (and then some) without needing a charge and the M1 version is super fast. The reviews on YouTube are true so I would recommend watching some reviews if you are still unsure. I am so happy with the M1 and it doesn't have a fan which means no fan noises and my M1 has been cool with multiple tabs open, browsing, and streaming music/videos. I hope this helps.
Nothing is different other than the chipset, which has moved from intel to Apple's M1 chip. Now according to apple, these computers are faster and saves more battery.
It changes a lot.
nice processor

faqs.questionTitle: Does this MacBook have a built-in HDMI port?
answersForQuestion: No. It has 2 Thunderbolt 3 ports that you can get an adapter for to give you HDMI.
No. However, you can connect your MacBook Air to HDMI using the a USB-C Digital AV Multiport Adapter. (sold separately)
I am afraid not for Mac book air and pro m1 2020 it has only the thunderbolts 2 points

faqs.questionTitle: can you download your ipad apps on this laptop?
answersForQuestion: Yes, all apple apps now compatible on the M1 macbook pro and M1 mb air and M1 macmini.

faqs.questionTitle: Will this go on sale for Black Friday?
answersForQuestion: Most likely not. Given this has just now released and how new it is, it will most likely not go on a black Friday sale this year.

My family bought both my sisters open box models of the m1 MacBook Air and saved a lot of money. They come with the one year manufacturer’s warranty and AppleCare can still be added. The open box price can vary based on color and condition and will stack with sale prices, too.
Probably not. Most likely there will be major discounts on previous generation with intel processor, Right now Apple will give $100 discount on new model to students and military/veterans.
I know I am 3 years late but this is on sale right now from the looks of it. I’m seeing it for around $730 and I purchased it a year ago for $1099!

faqs.questionTitle: If purchasing by open-box, are they from the open shelf display or is it from a returner?
answersForQuestion: Yes, they are often returns from costumers. The Geek Squad usually revises the merchandise and make sure everything is acceptable. Once you purchase the open box item, it comes with warrantee.

faqs.questionTitle: How well does this laptop work with zoom?
answersForQuestion: This Laptop works very well with zoom. The camera quality has gotten better by bringing in natural colors and lighting. The zoom quality is perfect!

The M1 chip has now reset the benchmark for video production. The rendering time is ridiculous for 4k video. This tiny $1000 MacBook Air with the M1 will destroy the $4,000 MacBook Pro when using Premiere Pro. Plus, the built in microphone is designed to be super high quality as well. The MacBook Pro M1 now has an even better, "studio quality" 3 zone mic for voiceovers, etc. These M1 machines are literally going to rewrite content production.

Zoom is like hitting a fly with a sledgehammer!
